getQuotationSubtitle: Effortless solar panel pricing at your fingertips.
chooseUsDesc: Discover the advantages of automated quoting.
instantPricingDesc: Receive accurate solar panel quotes in seconds, not days.
userFriendlyDesc: Our platform is designed for simplicity, making quoting a breeze.
comprehensiveOptionsDesc: Explore a variety of solar solutions tailored to your needs.
step1Desc: Enter your details to get started with your quote.
step2Desc: Receive tailored quotes based on your specifications.
step3Desc: Review your options and select the best plan for you.
getQuoteSubtext: Please fill the form below to receive a quote for your project.
step1Subtext: Please select which service you are interested in and set quantity.
step3Subtext: Based on your selection, this is the approximate price:
submitDesc: Please review all the information you previously typed in the past steps, and if all is okay, submit your quotation to us! You will receive a reply within a week.
historyDesc: Below are the quotations officially submitted to the company.
